question.short: Which has lower emissions: gas cars or electric cars?
question.long: Which has lower greenhouse gas emissions: gas cars or electric cars?

description: Results from studies comparing greenhouse gas emissions of gasoline-powered cars and electric vehicles (over their full lifecycle).

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on whether gas cars or electric cars have lower greenhouse gas emissions

gas_cars.description: The literature suggests that gas cars have lower greenhouse gas emissions than electric cars

towards_gas_cars.description: The literature suggests that gas cars may have lower greenhouse gas emissions than electric cars, but more research is needed

no_difference.description: The literature suggests that greenhouse gas emissions are similar for gas and electric cars

towards_electric_cars.description: The literature suggests that electric cars may have lower greenhouse gas emissions than gas cars, but more research is needed

electric_cars.description: The literature suggests that electric cars have lower greenhouse gas emissions than gas cars

gas_cars.description: The results of the paper suggest that gas cars have lower greenhouse gas emissions than electric cars

gas_cars_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that gas cars may have lower greenhouse gas emissions than electric cars, unlike what is reported in the literature

gas_cars_but_slight_difference.description: The results of the paper suggest that gas cars may have slightly lower greenhouse gas emissions than electric cars

gas_cars_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that gas cars may have lower greenhouse gas emissions than electric cars, but the evidence is not strong

gas_cars_but_mixed.description: The results of the paper suggest that gas cars have generally lower greenhouse gas emissions than electric cars, except in certain cases

mixed.description: The results of the paper cannot determine which vehicle type has lower greenhouse gas emissions

no_difference.description: The results of the paper suggest that gas and electric cars have similar greenhouse gas emissions

no_results.description: There is not enough evidence to determine which vehicle type has lower greenhouse gas emissions

electric_cars_but_mixed.description: The results of the paper suggest that electric cars have generally lower greenhouse gas emissions than gas cars, except in certain cases

electric_cars_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that electric cars may have lower greenhouse gas emissions than gas cars, but the evidence is not strong

electric_cars_but_slight_difference.description: The results of the paper suggest that electric cars have slightly lower greenhouse gas emissions than gas cars

electric_cars_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that electric cars may have lower greenhouse gas emissions than gas cars, unlike what is reported in the literature

electric_cars.description: The results of the paper suggest that electric cars have lower greenhouse gas emissions than gas cars
